Will the help get there in time?'] Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Pål Øie'], 'Producers': ['John Einar Hagen', 'Einar Loftesnes'], 'Starring': ['Thorbjørn Harr', 'Ylva Lyng Fuglerud', 'Lisa Carlehed']} Review Text: This movie is a dubbed foreign film, however, you can't tell it. Review Title: Excellent Suspense Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Tomorrow War Review Date: 2021/07/02 Categories: Suspense, Drama, Compelling, Frightening Product Description: ['Time travelers arrive from 2051 to deliver an urgent message: 30 years in the future mankind is losing a war against a deadly alien species. The only hope for survival is for soldiers and civilians to be transported to the future and join the fight. A timeless love is forged at an unusual time. It is happy, sad, and yet has an AWESOME ending.
A few days in a mom and sons life forges who they will be the rest of their lives.
Get some kleenex and watch a GREAT movie. Believable story line, excellently told, with beautiful scenery. Review Title: Heart stopping action that will leave you on the edge of your seat Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Gilbert', 'Brian Grazer', 'Jon Kuyper', 'Michael Lesslie', 'Chris Lowenstein', 'Karen Lunder'], 'Starring': ['Viggo Mortensen', 'Colin Farrell', 'Joel Edgerton'], 'Studio': ['Amazon Studios']} Review Text: This is one of the best movies I have seen in years and I am an avid movie buff. Viggo Mortensen, Colin Farrell, and Joel Edgeton gave excellent performances. My hate is off to Ron Howard, not many directors could take a situation like this and put you there the way he has. Congratulations to the whole crew. Review Title: Exciting, Exhilerating, Scary, Breath Taking AWESOME Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2022/08/09 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jason Reitman'], 'Producers': ['Lianne Halfon', 'Russell Smith', 'Jason Reitman'], 'Starring': ['Josh Brolin', 'Kate Winslet'], 'Studio': ['Drama']} Review Text: This movie is an excellent movie. Review Title: Excellent movie on understanding, romance, and love Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2022/08/17 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Martin Campbell'], 'Producers': ['Marcia Nasatir', 'Robert King', 'Lloyd Phillips', 'Martin Campbell'], 'Starring': ["Chris O'donnell", 'Scott Glenn', 'Bill Paxton'], 'Studio': ['COLUMBIA']} Review Text: I have watched many climbing movies. raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual displays a clear preference for engaging and thrilling cinematic experiences, primarily within the suspense and drama genres, frequently celebrating elements such as beautiful scenery and compelling storytelling. High ratings predominantly indicate satisfaction with plot complexity, character development, and emotional impact, as seen in their positive responses to movies classified as compelling, unusual, or exhilarating. They value quality aspects in film, including strong performances by well-known actors and effective direction. 

Common themes in their selections include a fascination with survival stories, family dynamics, and emotional depth, suggesting they seek meaningful narratives that evoke strong sentiments. Their interest spans period dramas, foreign films, and action-packed adventures, indicating versatility. However, their criticism of a specific movie with LGBTQ themes points to a nuanced stance on content, possibly reflecting a preference for traditional storytelling.

Quality is important, as evidenced by consistently high ratings above 4.0, while their varied reactions reveal some price sensitivity or selectivity in viewing, as they engage with both mainstream and independent productions. Overall, this person gravitates towards films that combine stunning visuals, emotional resonance, and gripping narratives, valuing both entertainment and artistic merit.

target_interaction.title: Fun, scary, and believable.
target_interaction.text: Excellent special effects, believable characters.  If you like disaster movies I highly recommend this one.
